Package dog.giraffe.cluster

Interface ReplaceEmptyCluster<P extends Points>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Log
    public interface ReplaceEmptyCluster<P extends Points>
extends Log
    Method to replace cluster that became empty.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface dog.giraffe.Log

        log

    • Method Detail

      • farthest

        static <P extends Points> ReplaceEmptyCluster<P> farthest​(boolean notNear)
        Selects a farthest data point from the existing centers as the new center. If notNear is true it will select a point that is farthest from the nearest center to it. If notNear is false it will select a point that has the maximal sum of all the distances to all the existing centers.

      • newCenter

        void newCenter​(java.util.List<Vector> centers,
               Context context,
               int maxIterations,
               P points,
               java.util.List<Points> points2,
               Continuation<Vector> continuation)
        throws java.lang.Throwable
        Selects a vector as a replacement center.
        Parameters:
        centers - existing centers
        maxIterations - the maximum number of iterations to try to find a new center
        points - the input data points
        points2 - the result of points.split()
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • random

        static <P extends Points> ReplaceEmptyCluster<P> random()
        Select randomly a data point as a new centers. If the randomly selected vector is already in the existing centers it will try again.
